delete.summary: Delete a user by _id and userType
delete.description: Deletes a user based on the provided userType and prevents self-deletion.

get.description: Retrieve data from the Users and Tourists tables.

post.description: Adds a new tour guide to the system.

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the tour guide to create.

username.description: The username for the tour guide.

password.description: The password for the tour guide.

email.description: The email address of the tour guide.

mobileNum.description: The mobile number of the tour guide.

400.description: Bad request due to missing input.

409.description: Conflict due to existing username or email.

mobileNum.description: The updated mobile number of the tour guide.

post.description: Registers a new user based on the user type (tourist, tourGuide, advertiser, seller).

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of user to register (tourist, tourGuide, advertiser, seller).

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: User registration details.

mobileNum.description: The mobile number of the tourist (only for type `tourist`).

nation.description: The nationality of the tourist (only for type `tourist`).

dob.description: The date of birth of the tourist (only for type `tourist`).

profession.description: The profession of the tourist (only for type `tourist`).

400.description: Bad request due to missing input.

409.description: Conflict due to existing username or email.

post.description: Creates a new historical tag associated with cultural heritage.

type.description: The type of the historical tag (e.g., monuments, museums, etc.).

period.description: The historical period associated with the tag.

id.description: The ID of the created historical tag.

type.description: The type of the historical tag.

period.description: The historical period associated with the tag.

400.description: Bad Request, validation errors or invalid tag type.

message.example: Only tourism governors can create historical tags

get.description: Get activity details based on the provided activity ID and user ID. Only 'advertiser' type users can access this endpoint.

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the activity to retrieve.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user requesting the activity.

400.description: Invalid input or user type.

put.description: Updates the details of an existing activity.

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the activity to update.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user making the update.

date.description: The updated date of the activity.

time.description: The updated time of the activity.

location.description: The updated location of the activity.

price.description: The updated price of the activity.

category.description: The updated ID of the category for the activity.

tags.description: Updated tags associated with the activity.

specialDiscounts.description: Updated special discounts for the activity.

isOpen.description: Indicates if the activity is open.

id.description: The ID of the updated activity.

date.description: The updated date of the activity.

time.description: The updated time of the activity.

location.description: The updated location of the activity.

price.description: The updated price of the activity.

category.description: The updated ID of the category for the activity.

tags.description: Updated tags associated with the activity.

specialDiscounts.description: Updated special discounts for the activity.

isOpen.description: Indicates if the activity is open.

400.description: Missing inputs, invalid type, or invalid fields in the update request.

delete.description: Deletes an activity by its ID.

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the activity to delete.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user making the delete request.

400.description: Missing inputs or invalid user type.

parameters.description: The ID of the user requesting the activities.

created_by.description: The ID of the user who created the activity.

category.description: The ID of the category for the activity.

id.description: The ID of the created activity.

isOpen.description: Indicates if the activity is open.

created_by.description: The ID of the user who created the activity.

400.description: Missing required fields or invalid user type.

get.description: Fetches an itinerary based on its ID and the user type.

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the itinerary to retrieve.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user making the request.

400.description: Missing ID or invalid user type.

put.description: Updates the specified itinerary with new data. Only tour guides can update itineraries.

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the itinerary to update.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user making the request.

directions.example: Take bus number 5 to reach the destination.

400.description: Invalid request due to missing id or user type.

delete.description: Deletes the specified itinerary. Only tour guides can delete itineraries.

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the itinerary to delete.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user making the request.

400.description: Invalid request due to missing id or user type.

get.summary: Retrieve all itineraries for a user
get.description: Fetches all itineraries created by a specific user based on their user ID.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user whose itineraries are being requested.

400.description: Invalid user ID or user type.

post.description: Creates a new itinerary with the specified details.

directions.example: Take bus number 5 to reach the destination.

400.description: Missing required fields or invalid input.

post.description: Creates a new historical place with the specified details. Only tourism governors are authorized to create historical places.

description.example: A beautiful historical site with rich cultural heritage.
A beautiful historical site with rich cultural heritage.

400.description: Missing required fields or invalid input.

message.example: You are not authorized to create a Historical Place.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all historical places. Only tourism governors are authorized to access this endpoint.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user making the request.

description.example: A beautiful historical site with rich cultural heritage.

400.description: Missing userId or invalid user type.

get.summary: Retrieve a historical place by ID
get.description: Fetch a specific historical place using its ID. Only tourism governors are authorized to access this endpoint.

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the historical place to retrieve.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user making the request.

description.example: A beautiful historical site with rich cultural heritage.

400.description: Missing inputs or invalid user type.

put.summary: Update a historical place by ID
put.description: Update an existing historical place using its ID. Only tourism governors are authorized to make updates.

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the historical place to update.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user making the request.

description.example: An updated description for the historical site.
An updated description for the historical site.

400.description: Missing inputs or invalid user type.

delete.summary: Delete a historical place by ID
delete.description: Deletes an existing historical place using its ID. Only tourism governors are authorized to perform this action.

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the historical place to delete.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user making the request.

400.description: Missing inputs or invalid user type.

picture.description: The URL of the product picture.

parameters.description: The ID of the user retrieving available products.

picture.description: The URL of the product picture.

reviews.description: List of reviews for the product.

parameters.description: The ID of the user filtering products.

parameters.description: The minimum price of products to retrieve.

parameters.description: The maximum price of products to retrieve.

reviews.description: List of reviews for the product.

parameters.description: The ID of the product to be updated.

picture.description: The URL of the product picture.

price.description: The updated price of the product.

description.description: The updated description of the product.

originalQuantity.description: The updated original quantity of the product.

ratings.description: The updated ratings of the product.

reviews.description: The updated list of reviews for the product.

originalQuantity.description: The original quantity of the product available.

ratings.description: The updated ratings of the product.

reviews.description: Updated list of reviews for the product.

get.summary: Sort products by price or rating

parameters.description: The criterion to sort by (price or rating).

reviews.description: List of reviews for the product.
